# tutor

<!-- badges: start -->

<!-- badges: end -->

This R package provides interactive tutorials, and wants to help third semester engineering students get a better understanding of the R programming language.  
The contents are german, as this is a project of a german university.

Additionaly, there are some real-life datasets supplied with this package to achieve a hands-on approach of data science.

## Installation

You can install the development version of tutor from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("statistik-lehre/tutor")
```
